item.description:
$20 All proceeds benefit the My Sandy Hook Family Fund! Get Down For Newtown – A Benefit Concert for Sandy Hook. A day of funk, blues, rock and soul featuring the best lineup of local bands ever assembled on one stage: Pocket Full of Soul, What Up Funk, Rubber City Blues Band, Kathy Thompson Band, and Special Guests! Dancing in the aisles is encouraged!

General Tickets: $20
Tickets at http://thebijoutheatre.com/films/newtown/

Doors open at 2pm
Live music 3pm to 7pm

Showtimes:

3:00 Kathy Thompson Band
3:45 Rubber City Blues Band
4:30 Pocket Full of Soul
5:30 What up Funk Band

My Sandy Hook Family Fund — an organization created to establish relief funds to provide immediate and long term support for the 26 families of the Sandy Hook victims.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Get Down For Newtown - A Benefit Concert For Sandy Hook
